document_data.name: ''Harsh Songblade''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''harsh songblade''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[sword]] meant to be wielded by a [[bard]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Out of Hatred|38}}{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Hand of Darkness|36}}
document_data.Description: Any heavy or light [[blade]] could be enchanted to become a ''harsh songblade''.
document_data.Powers:
Like other ''[[songblade]]s'', ''harsh songblades'' were magically sharp and strong weapons that could be used as [[implement]]s for bardic [[spell]]casting.

A bard could use the blade to channel thundering [[magic]], causing it to unleash a wail that could daze the bard's foes, leaving anyone within {{SI|10|feet|long=yes}} senseless.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Bragg]], a [[dragonborn]] [[wererat]] active in [[Tymanther]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Hand of Darkness|29}}
* The [[Benevolent Order of Magists and Protectors]] of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Out of Hatred|34}}
